name: xThemeSong
overview: Download theme songs from YouTube or upload custom MP3s for your media library
description: A plugin that automatically downloads theme songs from YouTube by user provided video ID/URL or allows uploading custom MP3 files. Features complete Web UI with drag-and-drop upload, audio player, export/import, role-based permissions, per-user preferences, and media library overview.
changelog: v1.2.10: Fixed volume/duration never applying (theme songs served at /Audio/{id}/universal, not /ThemeMedia/ â€” now uses viewshow-timing detection). Fixed enable/disable checkbox inconsistency (server prefs now always-sync to localStorage on load). Persistent volumechange guard with ownVolumeChange flag + setTimeout fallbacks based on PR #6673 findings.
